education_text.0: Koller received a bachelor's degree from the      Hebrew University of Jerusalem Hebrew University of Jerusalem in 1985, at the age of 17, and a master's degree from the same institution in 1986, at the age of 18After her PhD, Koller did      redirect    Postdoctoral research postdoctoral research at      University of California, Berkeley University of California, Berkeley from 1993 to 1995 under   After her PhD, Koller did      redirect    Postdoctoral research postdoctoral research at      University of California, Berkeley University of California, Berkeley from 1993 to 1995 under   She and      Andrew Ng Andrew Ng, a fellow Stanford computer science professor in the AI lab, founded      Coursera in 2012Koller is primarily interested in representation, inference, learning, and decision making, with a focus on applications to      Computer vision computer vision and      Computational biology computational biologyHer former doctoral students include      Lise Getoor Lise Getoor,               Mehran Sahami Mehran Sahami,               Suchi Saria Suchi Saria,               Eran Segal Eran Segal,          and      Ben Taskar Ben TaskarKoller's book authorships include
